explains: n. 优柔寡断；犹豫不决

sentences.en: A man of indecision is infuriating to watch.
sentences.cn: 优柔寡断的男人让人一看就生气。

sentences.en: After months of indecision, the government gave the plan the go-ahead on Monday.
sentences.cn: 经过几个月的犹豫不决，政府在周一批准了这项计划。

sentences.en: After a moment's indecision, he said yes.
sentences.cn: 他犹豫片刻之后答应了。
